alert.note: Alert for Hempstead; Lafayette; Miller; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 2:32PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Hempstead, northern Miller, north central Lafayette, southwestern Nevada and southeastern Bowie Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 231 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Texarkana, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Hope, Wake Village, Nash, Emmet, Perrytown, Fulton, Bodcaw, Mandeville, Genoa, Mount Pleasant, Patmos, Oakhaven, Sutton, Pleasant Hill, Hervey and Homan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for southwestern Arkansas...and northeastern Texas.
